name: latest_rates
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool currency_v3.
Tool description: Get current and historical currency exchange rates with ease. Rates from the European Central Bank, updated every 15 minutes.
API description: Fetch the latest real-time exchange rate data for specified symbols and base currency.

base.description: The three-letter currency or metal code for the preferred base currency.

symbols.description: A list of comma-separated currency or metal codes to limit the output.
